title: EU order totals missing
description: Order total is NULL for EU orders
dataset_system: but dashboards expect revenue per transaction
detected_by: EU revenue dashboards show zeroed totals for July
fix_reference: Updated the EU order aggregation to coalesce totals and trim NULL rows
preventive_control: Re-ran completeness check and confirmed dashboards now show totals
notes: Added EU-specific completeness alert and automated test for total_amount
column24: Recurring from July; follow up with partner about feed stability

title: Duplicate customer records
description: Customer IDs appear twice with diff emails so marketing sends duplicate messages
business_impact: Marketing automation sends duplicates; analytics double-counts customer lifetime value
evidence_link_or_query: SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM crm.customers GROUP BY 1 HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
remediation_summary: Built temporary flag on duplicates and preparing dedup job
verification_steps: Run dedupe job, confirm no duplicates, and notify marketing
preventive_control: Added dedup monitoring query and alert when duplicates exceed threshold
notes: Recurring regression; upstream loader review pending

title: Invalid inventory status
description: Inventory.status includes SOLDOUT but schema only allows IN_STOCK
detected_by: UI shows blank state for items marked SOLDOUT, but stock counts remain accurate
fix_reference: Mapped SOLDOUT to OUT_OF_STOCK during ingestion and documented new contract
preventive_control: Confirmed enumerations via SQL audit and UI spot-check
notes: Added enum constraint check and documented allowed statuses
column24: Documented contract expectation in taxonomy guide
